interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: C.O. Bigelow No. 007 Dr Hiosous Quince Hand Lotion, 4 Ounces Review Date: 2019/12/23 Store: C. O. Bigelow Average Rating: 4.6 Product Details: {'Brand': 'C. O. Bigelow', 'Item Form': 'Lotion', 'Unit Count': '4 Ounce', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Use for': 'Hands', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '6.6 x 2 x 0.7 inches; 5.61 Ounces', 'Item model number': '20002240'} Review Text: Harsh frigid air outside and dry heat inside have made my hands so dry this winter. I have a plethora of creams and lotions but nothing works as well as this Quince hand lotion. Seriously, this is best hand cream I've ever used.

The tube it good sized and the lotion is thick and creamy. It isn't greasy at all and absorbs into the skin. I does feel like it creates some kind of invisible glove barrier. Since using it, my hands and cuticles have been softer and are healing. The scent is very faint and a little odd. I can't quite put my finger on what it is, but it does have a bit of a citrusy scent. It doesn't smell like quince fruit or carrot, but it's not a bad smell.

C.O. Bigelow makes amazing products and this one doesn't disappoint. Put it on at night and your hands will thank you. You'll feel and see a difference in the morning! Review Title: Works like a dream Rating: 5.0 --------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
YOUFA Brazilian Human Hair Bundles 16 18 20 with Closure Straight Hair Unprocessed Virgin Hair Extensions Natural Color(16 18 20 +14"closure) YOUFA {'Brand': 'YOUFA', 'Color': 'Natural', 'Material': 'Human Hair', 'Extension Length': '14 Inches', 'Hair Type': 'Straight', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '10 x 7.7 x 2.1 inches; 12.8 Ounces'} This hair is soooooo luxurious!!! The bundles are probably middle weight-not super thin or lightweight but not suer heavy either. They are perfect for making clip in extensions or pony tail wraps. The hair is soo soft and thick but looks fine with my fine hair.
Mine came with a small silk piece to use as a topper or perhaps bangs. The one I got was a bit weird. The hair all went to a slight angle. I don't know if this is from being packed or what. I am going to wash it and brush it straight while wet and see how it dries. I'd love to have a little topper piece but if it stays slanted I'll make it into something else. Gorgeous hair!!! C.O. Bigelow No. 007 Dr Hiosous Quince Hand Lotion, 4 Ounces C. O. Bigelow {'Brand': 'C. O. Bigelow', 'Item Form': 'Lotion', 'Unit Count': '4 Ounce', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Use for': 'Hands', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '6.6 x 2 x 0.7 inches; 5.61 Ounces', 'Item model number': '20002240'} Harsh frigid air outside and dry heat inside have made my hands so dry this winter. I have a plethora of creams and lotions but nothing works as well as this Quince hand lotion. Seriously, this is best hand cream I've ever used.

The tube it good sized and the lotion is thick and creamy. It isn't greasy at all and absorbs into the skin. I does feel like it creates some kind of invisible glove barrier. Since using it, my hands and cuticles have been softer and are healing. The scent is very faint and a little odd. I can't quite put my finger on what it is, but it does have a bit of a citrusy scent. It doesn't smell like quince fruit or carrot, but it's not a bad smell.

C.O. Bigelow makes amazing products and this one doesn't disappoint. Put it on at night and your hands will thank you. You'll feel and see a difference in the morning! Works like a dream
profile:
**User Summary:**

- **Product Preference:** Enjoys high-quality, luxurious human hair extensions, specifically straight types, and now also shows an appreciation for quality personal care products, such as hand lotions.
- **Quality Standards:** Values softness and thickness in hair extensions and effective, non-greasy formulations in skincare items, indicating a preference for products that feel durable yet provide noticeable results.
- **Buyer's Approach:** Open to experimenting with product adjustments (e.g., washing and styling hair) and actively seeking effective solutions for skincare, reflecting a hands-on attitude toward beauty and self-care.
- **Specific Uses:** Interested in versatility for creating clip-in extensions and ponytails in hair care, with a newfound appreciation for products that offer skin hydration and repair, particularly in challenging weather conditions.
- **Attention to Detail:** Notices product packaging and presentation in hair extensions and evaluates the effectiveness and textures in personal care, suggesting a keen eye for quality and performance across categories.
- **Review Behavior:** Tends to leave positive reviews, reflecting satisfaction with products that meet or exceed expectations, demonstrating a willingness to share experiences that highlight value and functionality.

This user demonstrates a consistent pattern of prioritizing quality, versatility, and attention to detail in both hair care and skincare purchases.
